channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Missing bin by bus stop., 25th August
item.description:
There used to be a bin by the Southover bus stop heading towards Bromley but it is now gone and rubbish is being thrown all over the road. Could the bin be put back, please?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 71, Burnt Ash Lane, Sundridge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Anti refugee graffiti, 25th August
item.description:
At various locations on this road and into corelli road, and possibly elsewhere, St George flags, red crosses, painted on zebra crossing and other locations
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 392, Shooters Hill Road, Charlton, London

item.title: Growth around base, 25th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 67, Hurst Road, Albany Park, Sidcup, London

item.title: Tree roots and branches, 25th August
item.description:
I use crutches to walk and fell at 11 pm last night towards the bottom end of Witham road - near numbers 11? The roots down our road are causing treacherous lifting if pavements and tarmac The tree outside our house, number 47, is doing the same and thd branches go over our property
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Witham Road, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Constant fly tipping at this location., 25th August
item.description:
Non-residents are constantly leaving household waste (including bags of dirty nappies) at this location. Overloads bins and gets ripped apart by foxes. Disgusting and health hazard.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clarissa Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
